regular.description: for regular menu item in header, footer

drawer.description: for menu item in header's drawer

regular bold.description: for regular menu item in header, footer state active

drawer bold.description: for menu item in header's drawer state active

regular.description: for regular menu item in header, footer style CAP

drawer.description: for menu item in header's drawer style CAP

cap.description: for subheading in content-block-based sections style CAP

comp-heading-m.description: for general card & regular-size component heading

comp-xs-tag.description: for badges, tags, etc style CAP

rad-0.description: for section with no corner radius

rad-l.description: for banner, media with text, overlay component

p-banner-outer-x.description: outer padding x of banner section

p-banner-outer-y.description: outer padding y of banner section

p-banner-inner-x.description: inner padding x of banner section

p-banner-inner-y.description: inner padding y of banner section

p-overlay-inner-small.description: inner padding bottom của overlay header & top của overlay footer

list-3xs.description: xsmall gap between items. E.g Multi-image banner

list-m.description: medium gap between items in list section, header on desktop, etc

list-xs.description: small gap between items. E.g Button list block in Featured headings

heading-body.description: gap giữa regular heading và body

within-body.description: gap giữa các thành phần body với nhau ở level đầu tiên: giữa list với page indicator, list với tab với bottom button

m-block-2xs.description: margin size 2xs of blocks in block-based card like Product card, Blog post card

m-block-xs.description: margin size xs of blocks in block-based card like Product card, Blog post card

m-block-m.description: margin size m of blocks in block-based card like Product card, Blog post card

m-block-l.description: margin size m of blocks in block-based card like Product card, Blog post card

m-block-3xl.description: margin size m of blocks in block-based card like Product card, Blog post card

m-heading-xl.description: margin size xl of blocks in featured headings component

m-heading-2xl.description: margin size 2xl of blocks in featured headings component

m-heading-m.description: margin size  m of blocks in featured headings component

regular.description: for regular menu item in header, footer

drawer.description: for menu item in header's drawer

regular bold.description: for regular menu item in header, footer state active

drawer bold.description: for menu item in header's drawer state active

regular.description: for regular menu item in header, footer style CAP

drawer.description: for menu item in header's drawer style CAP

cap.description: for subheading in content-block-based sections style CAP

comp-heading-m.description: for general card & regular-size component heading

comp-xs-tag.description: for badges, tags, etc style CAP
